about_the_game:
Welcome to OxRox, the modern remake of the 2001 classic RoX by Safrosoft, a beloved boulder dash clone that captivated players with its darker tone, engaging gameplay and challenging puzzles. OxRox reimagines this timeless experience for today's audience, blending the essence of the original with modern user experience, Steam integration and a contemporary touch.

A Classic Reborn: At its core, OxRox remains true to the spirit of RoX, offering a casual experience filled with intricate puzzles, avoiding obstacles, outwitting enemies and strategizing against cascading boulders. Our goal was not to simply replicate, but to re-envision, crafting a game that feels both nostalgic and new.

What Makes OxRox Stand Out?

  • Modern Graphics and Sound: Beautifully updated visuals that bring the classic gameplay to life, accompanied by a captivating soundtrack that enhances the immersive experience.

  • Enhanced Gameplay Mechanics: The gameplay now behaves completely deterministic. We also introduced new mechanics and gameplay elements, offering a fresh challenge to both veterans of the original and newcomers alike.

  • Expansive Levels and Challenges: Discover a wide array of new levels, each designed to present a unique challenge that tests your wits and reflexes. From easy beginnings to hour-long puzzles, OxRox delivers a rich variety of experiences.

  • Leaderboards and Cloud-Saved Progression: Compete with players worldwide through leaderboards for each level and enjoy the convenience of cloud-saved level progression, ensuring your achievements and progress are preserved across devices.

  • Custom Creations and Community: With a powerful, user-friendly level editor, unleash your creativity by designing your own challenges and sharing them with the community via Steam Workshop.

A Tribute and a Step Forward

OxRox is a tribute to the legacy of RoX, reimagined with care, creativity, and modern innovation. Whether you're a long-time fan eager to relive the classic or a newcomer curious to experience it for the first time, OxRox offers an adventure that is both familiar and fresh.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern Linux distribution
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: OxRox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0 capable graphics card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Revive the boulder dash spirit with OxRox, a modern remake of the 2001 classic RoX with updated graphics, improved UI, controller support and Steam integration. Tackle new puzzles, compete on leaderboards, and explore bonus levels in this nostalgic yet fresh adventure.
